EmailTemplate.description: Used to inform the customer that their Case is still in progress.
EmailTemplate.name: 03 In Process
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS MARKIT Update for Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the IHS Automotive Global Product Help Desk.
We are writing to advise you that Case number {!Case.CaseNumber} is still in the process of being investigated and we will provide a resolution as soon as possible.
Should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us again, quoting Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thank you for your patience.
Kind regards, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} IHS Automotive Help Desk 01727733800 automotive_support@ihsmarkit.com
A complete description of the Case is as follows: --------------------------------------------------------------------------
{!Case.Description} --------------------------------------------------------------------------
